name: Circle (itch) (Ssoulner)
description:
A short game I made for fun over the holiday. You play as a circle with royal ambition. Your goal is to break into King Circle's home and steal his crown to become king yourself. On your journey, you murder competing circles, evade King Circle's traps and collect keys to proceed.

The music used was taken from Abstraction's Three Red Hearts album, go check him out: https://abstractionmusic.com/
